name: CORE Light - Design System Starter Kit
description:
The Starter Kit to your unique Design System

Start with a rock solid foundation and evolve from a simple system that work.


Start small, smarter & better. 

No 100+ useless predefined components, but a rock solid and simple start to let you build steps by steps your unique Design System.


What's inside?

  • Foundation: set the Foundations based on your brand attributes like Logos, Typefaces & Colors.
  • Components: start with the smallest and fundamental building block and work up from there.
  • Tokens: share your design values with developers by using Tokens and optimize collaboration.



Ready to go PRO?

Get your complete Design System Starter Kit


For more information, check https://designsystemcore.com/
